title: How to Make a Rocky Road Brownie Pizza

steps.headline: Spray a 12-inch pizza pan with nonstick spray coating.
Spread dough evenly over pizza pan.
Bake it for 28 minutes, or until done.
Take the pizza out of the oven and place on a wire rack.
Let the pizza cool for 10 minutes.
Transfer the pizza to a serving tray after 10 minutes of cooling.
Let the marshmallow cream soften for at least 1 minute, then spread evenly over pizza.
Sprinkle some walnuts over the pizza.
Cut the pizza into wedges.
steps.description: You can serve it warm or cold. This makes 16-20 servings

text: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees.  Spray a 12-inch pizza pan with nonstick spray coating.  Spread dough evenly over pizza pan.  Bake it for 28 minutes, or until done.  Take the pizza out of the oven and place on a wire rack.  Let the pizza cool for 10 minutes.  Transfer the pizza to a serving tray after 10 minutes of cooling.  Immediately dollop with marshmallow cream.  Let the marshmallow cream soften for at least 1 minute, then spread evenly over pizza.  Sprinkle on the chocolate chips.  Sprinkle some walnuts over the pizza.  Cut the pizza into wedges. You can serve it warm or cold. This makes 16-20 servings Finished.
